name: Exorcism
desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.

name: Sleight of Fist
desc: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.

name: Enchant Totem
desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Aftershock
desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

name: Macropyre
desc: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Penitence
desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

name: Dispersion
desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

name: Stampede
desc: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Magic Missile
desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

name: Shockwave
desc: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
